discourse_list.title: An extension to uniswap to leverage liquidity pools for lending and borrowing

content.content: Lending funds from the liquidity pool — tyxlb (mirror.xyz) writing in Chinese. You can use translator. In short, this extension can provide permissionless lending and it is not harmful to liquity. More feature are in the article. (I don’t know how to communicate with uniswap labs directly)
